Merriam Webster Dictionary News Feed Flight Status tracker New York Times Article Search Search Here Saved article APP developer: Siyuan Yu Version1.0 Users can read NEWS stories on the NEWS CRAWLER website through this app. This app also provides keyword search for article title. If users like an article, they can add the article to the local database using the save button.

The users can save and delete the article. When the user clicks one article, it will shows the details of the article. Are you sure to delete?
